long_description: With a heavy dose of heritage style and materials, the REI Flashback daypack lets you own a piece of the past while enjoying contemporary form and design. Heavy-duty, 500-denier nylon pack fabric and a high-quality, top-grain leather bottom panel stand up to all the rough use and hard-charging adventures you drag it through. Fully padded back panel offers all-day comfort. Leather lash patch, nylon webbing ice-axe loop and shoulder-strap snap loops let you attach accessories for a day hike or a commute across town. Main compartment cinches closed with a vintage-style cord and grommets. Internal fabric sleeve helps you organize pack contents; it can also hold a hydration reservoir (sold separately). REI Flashback daypack features an interior zippered pocket for securing keys and other small items.
short_description: With a heavy dose of heritage style and materials, the REI Flashback daypack lets you own a piece of the past while enjoying contemporary form and design.
